parent_issue.title: Implement user authentication system
parent_issue.body:
## Description

Implement a complete user authentication system with login, logout, and session management.

## Requirements

- Phase 1: Database schema for users
- Phase 2: Login/logout API endpoints
- Phase 3: Session management

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Users can register
- [ ] Users can log in
- [ ] Sessions persist correctly
